snippet: In the deadliest mine disaster since April, 21 bodies were recovered after a late-night fire in the northeastern city of Jixi.
abstract: Chinese authorities report 21 dead and one missing after fire breaks out in Xinghua coal mine in Heilongjiang Province.
lead_paragraph: In the deadliest mine disaster since April, 21 bodies were recovered after a late-night fire in the northeastern city of Jixi.

headline.main: Fire in Coal Mine Kills at Least 21 in China
headline.print_headline: Fire in Coal Mine Kills at Least 21 in China
